Package com.gcu.data.repository

Interface UserRepo

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<UserEntity,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<UserEntity,Long>
public interface UserRepo extends org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<UserEntity,Long>
Database interaction object for the users table

    • findByUsername

      @Query("SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = :username") UserEntity findByUsername(String username)
      find a user by their username
      Parameters:
      username - the username to search
      Returns:
      the user entity of found, null if not

    • testExists

      @Query("SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = :username OR email = :email") List<UserEntity> testExists(String username, String email)
      test if a username and/or email exists on a user
      Parameters:
      username - the username to check
      email - the email to check
      Returns:
      a list of applicable users

    • emailExists

      @Query("SELECT * FROM users WHERE email = :email") UserEntity emailExists(String email)
      test if just an email is taken by a user
      Parameters:
      email - the email to check
      Returns:
      the user if it is taken, null if not

    • getMetadata

      @Query("SELECT users.id, users.username, users.bio, users.created_date,\n COALESCE(fbc, 0) as followedByCount,\n COALESCE(fc, 0) as followingCount,\n COALESCE(lc, 0) as likesGiven\n FROM users\n LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT user_followed as fbc_id, count(*) fbc FROM follows GROUP BY fbc_id) i\n ON i.fbc_id = users.id\n LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT user_following as fb_id, count(*) fc FROM follows GROUP BY fb_id) as j\n ON j.fb_id = users.id\n LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT user_id, count(*) lc FROM likes GROUP BY user_id) as k\n ON k.user_id = users.id\n WHERE username = :username;") UserMetadataEntity getMetadata(String username)
      select and build the API representation of a user based on their username
      Parameters:
      username - the username to search
      Returns:
      the API representation of the user with that username

    • getAllMetadata

      @Query("SELECT users.id, users.username, users.bio, users.created_date,\n COALESCE(fbc, 0) as followedByCount,\n COALESCE(fc, 0) as followingCount,\n COALESCE(lc, 0) as likesGiven\n FROM users\n LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT user_followed as fbc_id, count(*) fbc FROM follows GROUP BY fbc_id) i\n ON i.fbc_id = users.id\n LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT user_following as fb_id, count(*) fc FROM follows GROUP BY fb_id) as j\n ON j.fb_id = users.id\n LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT user_id, count(*) lc FROM likes GROUP BY user_id) as k\n ON k.user_id = users.id;") List<UserMetadataEntity> getAllMetadata()
      select and build the API representation of all users
      Returns:
      the API representation of all users

    • findByEmail

      @Query("SELECT * FROM users WHERE email = :email") UserEntity findByEmail(String email)
      select a user based on their email
      Parameters:
      email - the email to search
      Returns:
      the user with that email

    • getUserFollowedBy

      @Query("SELECT j.username as username FROM follows LEFT JOIN (SELECT id as user_id, username FROM users GROUP BY id) as i ON follows.user_following = i.user_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT id as user_id, username FROM users GROUP BY id) as j ON follows.user_followed = j.user_id WHERE i.username = :username;") List<String> getUserFollowedBy(String username)
      get a string list representation of the usernames following a specified user
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the user who is followed
      Returns:
      a list of the usernames following that user

    • getUserFollowing

      @Query("SELECT j.username as username FROM follows LEFT JOIN (SELECT id as user_id, username FROM users GROUP BY id) as i ON follows.user_followed = i.user_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT id as user_id, username FROM users GROUP BY id) as j ON follows.user_following = j.user_id WHERE i.username = :username;") List<String> getUserFollowing(String username)
      get a string list representation of the username that a specified user is following
      Parameters:
      username - the username to check
      Returns:
      the usernames that are followed by the aforementioned username
